Name: Forest Watcher's Fastidiousness
Desc: A precise piece of laboratory equipment of appropriate size that appears to have the ability to automatically replenish the liquid in the main compartment. The containers at the sides can store two different kinds of potions to improve the overall safety of the equipment. Apart from using it for long-term research and observations, it can also be used to cultivate hydrophilic plants, or even act as a fish tank.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
